com.guardtime.container.signature

Interface ContainerSignature<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Class of the underlying signature.

    public interface ContainerSignature<O>
    General interface for all possible signature implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      O getSignature()
      Returns the underlying signature object.
      com.guardtime.ksi.hashing.DataHash getSignedDataHash()
      Returns the DataHash that is signed by the underlying signature.
      boolean isExtended()
      Returns true if the underlying signature has been extended.
      void writeTo(OutputStream output)
      Write content of signature to output.

    • Method Detail

      • writeTo

        void writeTo(OutputStream output)
      throws IOException
        Write content of signature to output.
        Parameters:
        output - stream to write signature to.
        Throws:
        IOException - when the stream can't be written to.

        Returns the underlying signature object.
